They acknowledge that Johns Hopkins has a larger international reputation, while Pomona is also highly respected among sophisticated employers and schools.

This statement indicates a personal preference for Johns Hopkins over Pomona College, albeit they also acknowledge that Pomona is tough and Hopkins has its own collaborative nature.
